vip.programDescription: With the GuduBet VIP Program, you can increase your level as you play.
vip.programBenefits: You can have different bonuses and privileges according to each level. Joining is completely free.
vip.programDetails: As soon as you become a member of GuduBet, you can automatically benefit from the advantages of the BRONZE level. To move to the next level, you need to collect 10,000 Points. 1 Point = 1 Euro, and if you play approximately 350,000 TL worth of games in total, you can rise to the SILVER level. For Silver level users, 2 Euro game turnover will earn 1 point. For Gold, Platinum, and Diamond level users, 3 Euro game turnover will earn 1 point.
vip.benefitsTitle: GuduBet VIP Program bonuses and privileges are specified below:
vip.wageringFreeDepositBonusDescription: This is the bonus amount you can receive on your deposits according to your VIP level. To benefit from this bonus, you need to select the relevant bonus from the bonuses page. Afterwards, the bonus will be automatically added to your account.
vip.levelUpPointsDescription: These are the points required to reach the next level. 1 point = 1 euro.
vip.specialPrivilegesDescription: Benefit from bonuses and promotions special to your VIP level
vip.personalSupportDescription: Special support service for our high-level members
vip.specialEventsDescription: Special tournaments and events for our VIP members
